name: Bigbossquiz
0:
”Alexa, launch big boss quiz”
”Alexa, repeat question”
”Alexa, option 1”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big boss quiz
des:
Bigg Boss is an Indian reality television game show. There have been seven versions of the show in different languages spoken in the Indian subcontinent. This quiz is based on the Hindi adaptation. If you think you remember everything from the time season 1 aired to the latest episode that released, then you're the perfect person to take this quiz.

How to play?
1. Say, 'Alexa launch big boss quiz'
2. Alexa will welcome you & give some instructions to play.
3. Say 'Start' to begin the quiz
4. Alexa will ask a question with 4 options. Only 1 option is correct.
5. Say 'Option one' if first option is correct.
6. Say 'Repeat question' if you want to repeat any question.
7. Say 'Help' at anytime to get help.
8. Say 'Stop' at anytime to stop the game.

What do we store?
All the game data is stored for the current session and is deleted after the session ends.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
